_sText:
this is a really great map! there are many mini games that you will like it. you can go from a cell into a chute. This shaft leads to a similar armored car. with the car you can drive across the room and surprise a few c'ts:) in this map you can even drive cars. well not really ^ ^ (you're standing in it in the car and it follows you forever) but does look cool ..
There is even a deathrun. on the football field you can get a zombie on the field let the players angry. (the zombie runs through the entire football field)
You can even adjust the lighting of the map. So dark / light ...
you can hunt a few laser beams through the map (see screenshots)
in a cell you find teletabbis two. po and TinkyWinky.
There is a pool and a basketballfleld.
There is also a very awesome mini game. It is a kind of platform.
t's all go to the platform and the ct 'can adjust the speed at which it turns. out of the last still standing has just won: /
in the laboratory also many fun things to discover.
so this map has really made a lot of work and I hope you enjoy it.

your mapper: dackelmausente1995

the models for the cars and the teletabbis are included download
have fun

STEAM: DACKELMAUSENTE1995
MAP BY DACKELMAUSENTE1995

I have the map now finally finished and there will be no other versions more
:)
